summary: We have 2 papers accepted by IEEE PacificVis 2024. These two papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG. We have 3 papers accepted by ACM CHI 2024 and 1 paper accepted by IEEE VR.
We have 3 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2023. These papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG.
Our paper OBTracker: Visual Analytics of Off-ball Movements in Basketball has been accepted by IEEE VIS 2022 (TVCG Track, Honorable Mention Award)

Our papers VisImages: A Fine-Grained Expert-Annotated Visualization Dataset and Visualizing the Scripts of Data Wrangling with SOMNUS have been accepted by TVCG 2022! Each paper is with an open-source project!
Jiachen Wang, one of our Ph.D. students, has received National Scholarships. Congratulations!
We are looking for strongly-motivated PhD students to join us! If you are interested in visualization research, please contact us.
Our paper Augmenting Sports Videos with VisCommentator has been accepted by IEEE VIS 2021 (TVCG Track, Honorable Mention Award)
Our paper Real-Time Visual Analysis of High-Volume Social Media Posts has been accepted by IEEE VIS 2021 (TVCG Track, Honorable Mention Award)
We have 9 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2021. These papers will also appear in IEEE TVCG.
Our paper Tac-Valuer: Knowledge-based Stroke Evaluation in Table Tennis has been accepted by KDD 2021
Our paper Tac-Miner: Visual Tactic Mining for Multiple Table Tennis Matches has been accepted by IEEE Pacific Visualization (TVCG Track, Honorable Mention Award)
Our paper Visual Cascade Analytics of Large-scale Spatiotemporal Data has been accepted by TVCG
Our paper EventAnchor: Reducing Human Interactions in Event Annotation of Racket Sports Videos has been accepted by ACM CHI 2021
We release a novel dataset for machine learning and visualization analysis! To view "VisImages: A Corpus of Images from Visualization Publications"!
We have 9 papers accepted by IEEE VIS 2020 , including 4 InfoVis papers, 4 VAST papers, and 1 short paper.
We are looking for strongly-motivated PostDoc, PhD, Master, and undergraduate students to join us! If you are interested in visualization research, please contact us.
Di Weng and Jiachen Wang, two of our Ph.D. members, have received National Scholarships. Congratulations!
Our paper AirVis: Visual Analytics of Air Pollution Propagation has been accepted by IEEE VAST 2019.
Our paper Tac-Simur: Tactic-based Simulative Visual Analytics of Table Tennis has been accepted by IEEE VAST 2019.
